com.codepoetics.protonpack

Interface Streamable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type over which the streamable's streams stream.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.stream.Stream<T>>

    public interface Streamable<T>
extends java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.stream.Stream<T>>
    A source of Streams that can be repeatedly streamed.
